mapper.insert: insert into movie (filmId, filmName, englishname, duration, country, picAddr, dimensional, director, actor, thirdFilmId, catalog, language, openingDate, description, score, type, cityCode, createTime, updateTime, omsId, regionCode ) values (#{filmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{englishname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dimensional,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{director,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdfilmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openingdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{citycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{omsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regioncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update movie set filmName = #{filmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, englishname = #{englishname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picAddr = #{picaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dimensional = #{dimensional,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, director = #{director,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actor = #{actor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thirdFilmId = #{thirdfilmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, catalog = #{catalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, openingDate = #{openingdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, cityCode = #{citycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, omsId = #{omsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regionCode = #{regioncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where filmId = #{filmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select filmId, filmName, englishname, duration, country, picAddr, dimensional, director, actor, thirdFilmId, catalog, language, openingDate, description, score, type, cityCode, createTime, updateTime, omsId, regionCode from movie where filmId = #{filmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
